meanings.def: a powder made from dried berries (called peppercorns), used to give a hot, spicy taste to food
examples: sirloin steak with a pepper sauce
Add salt and pepper to taste.
He put some pepper on his steak.

meanings.def: a hollow fruit, usually red, green or yellow, eaten as a vegetable either raw or cooked
examples: He gave me a great recipe for stuffed peppers.
peppers stuffed with meat and rice
